= ryuuganime-db =
Head Database Repository of Ryuuganime based on JSON, HJSON, YAML, XML, XLSX and HTML format.

__TOC__

== More informations ==
This database is using [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MediaWiki MediaWiki] (<code>.wiki</code>) for repository documentation markup format. For indexing, Ryuuganime is using [[/json|JSON]], [[hjson|HJSON]], [[yaml|YAML]], and [[xml|XML]] for current release. [[html|HTML]] and [[xlsx|XLSX]] files are deprecated. 

File structuring on this repo is using <code>fileExt/id1/id2.ext</code>.

The JSON files that Ryuuganime uses in the [[/json]] folder comply with standards which can also be machine validated with the [[/schemas/entry.json|JSON Schema]] file.
